column4: I have a microsoft mouse... Is there some drivers for ubuntu :S ??
just plug it in?
it's working but I have a frekign bug with it...
scrolling up making the browser (or some other program) doing BACK instead of just scrolling up...
have you looked in the mouse settings for anything unusual?
yup, I've tried all I found on forums... nothing to do.. may be i missed something or may be the computer need drivers...
Did the mouse have common issues? (ie other users having bugs with it too). What version of Ubuntu are you running? Dud the mouse ever work properly?

the bug is there since I've installed 10.04 and I have upgraded since this time up to 11.10 and the bug is always there... Some people had the bug but they change something in firefox and the resolved the trouble... Not me. The bug is not just on firefox
which mouse is it exactly?
do other mouses work correctly?
microsoft intelimouse explorer 4.0A usb/ps2 compatible... (intelimouse my as*)
it works perfectly except the wheelup
does the wheelup on other mouses work?
right. It might be an issue with your computer's settings. We need to isolate that before saying the MS mouse is the root cause.
i agree... it won't be the first time I have a trouble with a MS mouse ...
ok thx I'll try another mouse
ok, good
lol i found an other mouse, guess what... it is the same model... damn :(
I'll try it... brb
same trouble with the other mouse
